Posts.Content: Feb 19, 2012 06:36AM jkdowl wrote: I have twins that are 5 and a 2 year old. I was diagnosed last year. We did a Life chronicles video as a family to capture our lives together and I write in a journal which is addressed to them. I have started telling the twins stories of stories when I was young before bed and they love hearing those stories. I want them to remember me ,but more importantly, I want them to know the person I am. I am determined to live a long time for them!
Posts.Title: Coping as a young mom? rosasmommy klynnz
